title: Comes back from a 14 day ban and automatically deals with feeders fuck you riot
body: After being banned for 14 days i was happy to come back and play as i was hugely focus and really fresh to play. BUT OF COURSE the first game i play i get people who want to feed and how do i combat this i try assist lanes as im a mid main and what do they do they have a fucking big cry and then they say they want to feed fucking riot why cant i be with some decent players that want to play instrad of being with fuck wits i dont know what to fucking do anymore...

replies.body:
Step by Step instructions of what to do

1. Stop Complaining on Boards - It won't change anything
2. Go into Add/Remove Programs on your Computer
3. Find League of Legends, and Uninstall it
4. Problem Fixed, now go and play a different game
